alert.note: Alert for Kemper; Noxubee (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued June 14 at 3:01PM CDT until June 14 at 8:00PM CDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 330 PM CDT FOR SOUTHERN NOXUBEE AND NORTHEASTERN KEMPER COUNTIES... At 300 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Shuqualak, or 12 miles northeast of De Kalb, moving east at 45 mph. THIS IS A DESTRUCTIVE STORM FOR NORTHERN KEMPER AND SOUTHERN NOXUBEE COUNTIES... HAZARD...Three inch hail and 70 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be severely injured. Expect shattered windows, extensive damage to roofs, siding, and vehicles. This severe storm will be near... Scooba and Paulette around 305 PM CDT. Cooksville around 310 PM CDT. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...DESTRUCTIVE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...3.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...70 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
